Model.GameObjects

Class Ball

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.GameObjects.Ball
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBall, IMovable

    public class Ball
extends java.lang.Object
implements IBall, IMovable
    The ball class. It's basically a Facade pattern class to reduce coupling towards Physics package.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      Create a new Ball by cloning another ball instance.

      Create a new Ball without a speed or direction.

      Create a new Ball.

      • Ball

        public Ball(float xPos,
            float yPos,
            float radius,
            float angle,
            float speed)
        Create a new Ball.
        Parameters:
        xPos - the X position where to place the ball.
        yPos - the Y position where to place the ball.
        radius - the ball radius.
        angle - the ball direction in radians. 0=right, PI=left.
        speed - the ball speed.

      • move

        public void move(float deltaTime)
        Move the ball a given distance based on it's speed and direction. No collision handling in this method.
        Specified by:
        move in interface IMovable
        Parameters:
        deltaTime - the deltaTime on how far to move the ball. Multiplied into the speed.
